data.text:
A day off. For Inari One's training, I was out gathering some 
necessary materials―
data.processed:
󠁿A day off. For Inari One's training, I was out gathering some 
󠁿necessary materials―

data.text:
Boss, what a coincidence! 
What's up, out shoppin' alone?
data.name: Inari One
data.processed:
󠁿Boss, what a coincidence! 
󠁿What's up, out shoppin' alone?

data.text:
Boss, what a coincidence! 
What's up, out shoppin' alone?
data.name: Inari One
data.processed:
󠁿Boss, what a coincidence! 
󠁿What's up, out shoppin' alone?

data.text:
Nah, the followers are gonna be comin' here to visit soon, so I'm 
goin' around to the shops. Was thinkin' I could guide them around.
data.name: Inari One
data.processed:
󠁿Nah, the followers are gonna be comin' here to visit soon, so I'm 
󠁿goin' around to the shops. Was thinkin' I could guide them around.

data.text:
But, there's too many fancy stores around! I really wanna make a 
decision, but there are way too many options!
data.name: Inari One
data.processed:
󠁿But, there's too many fancy stores around! I really wanna make a 
󠁿decision, but there are way too many options!

data.text:
……That's it! Can't go wrong with Boss' sense! 
If you've got any recommendations, can ya tell me?!
data.name: Inari One
data.processed:
󠁿……That's it! Can't go wrong with Boss' sense! 
󠁿If you've got any recommendations, can ya tell me?!

data.text:
……That's it! Can't go wrong with Boss' sense! 
If you've got any recommendations, can ya tell me?!
data.name: Inari One
data.processed:
󠁿……That's it! Can't go wrong with Boss' sense! 
󠁿If you've got any recommendations, can ya tell me?!

data.text: Oh, thanks! I'm leavin' it to you, Boss!
data.name: Inari One
data.processed: 󠁿Oh, thanks! I'm leavin' it to you, Boss!

data.text: Oh, thanks! I'm leavin' it to you, Boss!
data.name: Inari One
data.processed: 󠁿Oh, thanks! I'm leavin' it to you, Boss!

data.text:
What the heck's with this flashy parfait!? It 
even has a really colorful flower on top of it……Ha～! 
So this is what they call a flourish!
data.name: Inari One
data.processed:
󠁿What the heck's with this flashy parfait!? It 
󠁿even has a really colorful flower on top of it……Ha～! 
󠁿So this is what they call a flourish!

data.text:
Oooh!? Everyone's walkin' around in their swimsuits, 
huh!? And over there, they're dancin'……how nice, 
it's almost like a festival!
data.name: Inari One
data.processed:
󠁿Oooh!? Everyone's walkin' around in their swimsuits, 
󠁿huh!? And over there, they're dancin'……how nice, 
󠁿it's almost like a festival!

data.text:
Oh, billiards, right!? I've seen it before! 
How 'bout it, let's have a one round match!
data.name: Inari One
data.processed:
󠁿Oh, billiards, right!? I've seen it before! 
󠁿How 'bout it, let's have a one round match!

data.text:
There's a bunch of stylish stuff here too, huh. 
……Oh, what's that over there?
data.name: Inari One
data.processed:
󠁿There's a bunch of stylish stuff here too, huh. 
󠁿……Oh, what's that over there?

data.text: I'm gonna go take a quick look over there!
data.name: Inari One
data.processed: 󠁿I'm gonna go take a quick look over there!

data.text:
Inari One was always worrying about everyone else. 
While looking at anything that caught her interest, 
she headed deeper in to the store.
data.processed:
󠁿Inari One was always worrying about everyone else. 
󠁿While looking at anything that caught her interest, 
󠁿she headed deeper in to the store.

data.text:
Since it seems like her 『followers』 were coming this time, it was 
a chance to relax, so hopefully she would take it easy.
data.processed:
󠁿Since it seems like her 『followers』 were coming this time, it was 
󠁿a chance to relax, so hopefully she would take it easy.

data.text: Until Inari One returned, I stayed nearby waiting―
data.processed: 󠁿Until Inari One returned, I stayed nearby waiting―

data.text:
Like I said, when I got home and opened it, it was broken! 
It should be fine to exchange it, right?
data.name: Male Customer
data.processed:
󠁿Like I said, when I got home and opened it, it was broken! 
󠁿It should be fine to exchange it, right?

data.text:
However, if there were no problems when it was wrapped up, 
well……then perhaps it bumped in to something along the way?
data.name: General Store Clerk
data.processed:
󠁿However, if there were no problems when it was wrapped up, 
󠁿well……then perhaps it bumped in to something along the way?

data.text:
At the register, a customer and clerk were arguing. The customer 
seemed to gradually be getting heated, it seemed like he might 
get physical with the clerk.
data.processed:
󠁿At the register, a customer and clerk were arguing. The customer 
󠁿seemed to gradually be getting heated, it seemed like he might 
󠁿get physical with the clerk.

data.text:
Even if I stepped in, there was the worry that 
I might get dragged in to it. I approached and 
called out to try and calm things down.

choices.text: Um, how about we calm down and talk this out?
choices.processed: <size=34>Um, how about we calm down and talk this out?</size>

data.processed:
󠁿Even if I stepped in, there was the worry that 
󠁿I might get dragged in to it. I approached and 
󠁿called out to try and calm things down.

data.text:
Huh!? Who are you!? Don't get involved! 
Or what? Are you going to――
data.name: Male Customer
data.processed:
󠁿Huh!? Who are you!? Don't get involved! 
󠁿Or what? Are you going to――

data.text:
Hey there, mister! 
It's good that you're so hot-blooded!
data.name: Inari One
data.processed:
󠁿Hey there, mister! 
󠁿It's good that you're so hot-blooded!

data.text:
……at the moment things might have reached a tipping point, 
a small-sized figure entered.
data.processed:
󠁿……at the moment things might have reached a tipping point, 
󠁿a small-sized figure entered.

data.text:
I heard it all. But, it can't be helped that there 
would be complaints. How 'bout putting it down 
in black and white with a one match battle!
data.name: Inari One
data.processed:
󠁿I heard it all. But, it can't be helped that there 
󠁿would be complaints. How 'bout putting it down 
󠁿in black and white with a one match battle!

data.text:
If it's a fight, there'll be no hard feelin's 
afterwards! Alright, let's get this started! 
Should it be a race, or how about――
data.name: Inari One
data.processed:
󠁿If it's a fight, there'll be no hard feelin's 
󠁿afterwards! Alright, let's get this started! 
󠁿Should it be a race, or how about――

data.text: ……Huh? W-what the heck are you saying……?
data.name: Male Customer
data.processed: 󠁿……Huh? W-what the heck are you saying……?

data.text:
What, there's no need to worry! If ya need a ref, just leave it 
to this Inari-sama! I'll decide it fairly with a bang!
data.name: Inari One
data.processed:
󠁿What, there's no need to worry! If ya need a ref, just leave it 
󠁿to this Inari-sama! I'll decide it fairly with a bang!

data.text:
……I-it's not like I want to settle this with a fight…… Ah-……yeah, 
it just that……I got a little heated……
data.name: Male Customer
data.processed:
󠁿……I-it's not like I want to settle this with a fight…… Ah-……yeah, 
󠁿it just that……I got a little heated……

data.text:
Aw man, so thinkin' you wanted to fight was just a 
misunderstandin' on my part! Sorry about that, mister! Forgive me.
data.name: Inari One
data.processed:
󠁿Aw man, so thinkin' you wanted to fight was just a 
󠁿misunderstandin' on my part! Sorry about that, mister! Forgive me.

data.text:
After being taken aback, the male customer took 
a look at Inari One's smiling face, he took a deep 
breath. ……Seems like things have calmed down.
data.processed:
󠁿After being taken aback, the male customer took 
󠁿a look at Inari One's smiling face, he took a deep 
󠁿breath. ……Seems like things have calmed down.

data.text:
……No, it's my fault. It was a present for my girlfriend, 
so I just lost it for a bit.
data.name: Male Customer
data.processed:
󠁿……No, it's my fault. It was a present for my girlfriend, 
󠁿so I just lost it for a bit.

data.text:
Shopkeeper, and you too……I apologize. 
You too…… um, thanks for stopping me.
data.name: Male Customer
data.processed:
󠁿Shopkeeper, and you too……I apologize. 
󠁿You too…… um, thanks for stopping me.

data.text:
Hey, Boss! To step in like that, 
you've got quite the guts, huh?
data.name: Inari One
data.processed:
󠁿Hey, Boss! To step in like that, 
󠁿you've got quite the guts, huh?

data.text:
Hey, Boss! To step in like that, 
you've got quite the guts, huh?
data.name: Inari One
data.processed:
󠁿Hey, Boss! To step in like that, 
󠁿you've got quite the guts, huh?

data.text:
Ya could have just pretended to see nothin', 
that's pretty impressive!
data.name: Inari One
data.processed:
󠁿Ya could have just pretended to see nothin', 
󠁿that's pretty impressive!

data.text:
What the heck, that's kind of embarrassin'! 
Hehee, but it's not so bad if you're the one sayin' it.
data.name: Inari One
data.processed:
󠁿What the heck, that's kind of embarrassin'! 
󠁿Hehee, but it's not so bad if you're the one sayin' it.

data.text:
At that time, if Inari One hadn't stepped in, 
things could have gotten out of hand.
data.processed:
󠁿At that time, if Inari One hadn't stepped in, 
󠁿things could have gotten out of hand.

data.text:
However, it was good that the male customer was able to calm down 
with just that, if he had gone off the rails……
data.processed:
󠁿However, it was good that the male customer was able to calm down 
󠁿with just that, if he had gone off the rails……

data.text:
Hm? What's wrong? You've got such a serious look on your face. 
Is there somethin' stuck on my face?
data.name: Inari One
data.processed:
󠁿Hm? What's wrong? You've got such a serious look on your face. 
󠁿Is there somethin' stuck on my face?

data.text:
Originally, it was me who stepped in in the first 
place, however, I'd rather avoid doing anything 
that might put Inari One in danger.
data.processed:
󠁿Originally, it was me who stepped in in the first 
󠁿place, however, I'd rather avoid doing anything 
󠁿that might put Inari One in danger.

data.text: Hehee, just when I thought you were makin' such a grave face……
data.name: Inari One
data.processed: 󠁿Hehee, just when I thought you were makin' such a grave face……

data.text:
What the heck are ya sayin', ya moron!! 
That's my line!
data.name: Inari One
data.processed:
󠁿What the heck are ya sayin', ya moron!! 
󠁿That's my line!

data.text:
Geez, you're too kind, Boss. 
Ya can't just go shoulderin' everythin' yourself!
data.name: Inari One
data.processed:
󠁿Geez, you're too kind, Boss. 
󠁿Ya can't just go shoulderin' everythin' yourself!

data.text:
Geez, you're too kind, Boss. 
Ya can't just go shoulderin' everythin' yourself!
data.name: Inari One
data.processed:
󠁿Geez, you're too kind, Boss. 
󠁿Ya can't just go shoulderin' everythin' yourself!

data.text:
Just like this time, if it had turned in to a 
fight……that's what ya mean right? But ya see, 
it's much better than seein' ya get hurt.
data.name: Inari One
data.processed:
󠁿Just like this time, if it had turned in to a 
󠁿fight……that's what ya mean right? But ya see, 
󠁿it's much better than seein' ya get hurt.

data.text:
After all, when it comes to power, an Uma Musume like me is stronger. 
So ya can just leave it all to me!
data.name: Inari One
data.processed:
󠁿After all, when it comes to power, an Uma Musume like me is stronger. 
󠁿So ya can just leave it all to me!

data.text:
When you were lost that time, I was the one that guided ya. 
And today, you were the one that guided me to a bunch of shops.
data.name: Inari One
data.processed:
󠁿When you were lost that time, I was the one that guided ya. 
󠁿And today, you were the one that guided me to a bunch of shops.

data.text:
I'll say it again. Clear out those things ya call ears, and 
listen well. There's no reason for ya to shoulder it all yourself!
data.name: Inari One
data.processed:
󠁿I'll say it again. Clear out those things ya call ears, and 
󠁿listen well. There's no reason for ya to shoulder it all yourself!

data.text:
Sometimes, ya should just leave it to someone that can handle it. 
The right person for the right job, right?
data.name: Inari One
data.processed:
󠁿Sometimes, ya should just leave it to someone that can handle it. 
󠁿The right person for the right job, right?

data.text:
Boss, you're too serious! ……Oh, seems like it's time for the sun 
to start settin', let's head back!
data.name: Inari One
data.processed:
󠁿Boss, you're too serious! ……Oh, seems like it's time for the sun 
󠁿to start settin', let's head back!

data.text:
Boss, you're too serious! ……Oh, seems like it's time for the sun 
to start settin', let's head back!
data.name: Inari One
data.processed:
󠁿Boss, you're too serious! ……Oh, seems like it's time for the sun 
󠁿to start settin', let's head back!

data.text:
(Boss is always serious and earnest, 
this Inari-sama, can see that, ya know?)
data.name: Inari One
data.processed:
󠁿(Boss is always serious and earnest, 
󠁿this Inari-sama, can see that, ya know?)

data.text:
(Boss is always serious and earnest, 
this Inari-sama, can see that, ya know?)
data.name: Inari One
data.processed:
󠁿(Boss is always serious and earnest, 
󠁿this Inari-sama, can see that, ya know?)

data.text:
(And because of that, that you'll easily push 
yourself too hard! Hehee, I need to keep an eye 
on ya, otherwise I'll be the one worryin'!)
data.name: Inari One
data.processed:
󠁿(And because of that, that you'll easily push 
󠁿yourself too hard! Hehee, I need to keep an eye 
󠁿on ya, otherwise I'll be the one worryin'!)

data.text:
Alright, I'll tell the followers all about today! 
『Inari-sama's trainer was today's guide』 or somethin'!
data.name: Inari One
data.processed:
󠁿Alright, I'll tell the followers all about today! 
󠁿『Inari-sama's trainer was today's guide』 or somethin'!

data.text:
Once again hitting me on the back, 
Inari One had a hearty smile on her face.
data.processed:
󠁿Once again hitting me on the back, 
󠁿Inari One had a hearty smile on her face.
